sn1.36:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn1.36:1.2: Atha kho sambahula satullapakayika devatayo abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu.
sn1.36:1.3: Ekamantam thita kho eka devata bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
sn1.36:2.3: Yaso ca kitti ca tatvassa hoti,
sn1.36:3.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike ima gathayo abhasi:
